CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bends the grid’s path into wavy motion – like giving it a little dance step.
CONTROLS.NAME: path_a

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Wave amplitude – crank it up for big swings, tone it down for subtle ripples.
CONTROLS.NAME: path_b

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How fine or chunky the grid looks in XY. Shrink it down for tighter vibes.
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_dim_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Grid spacing in depth (Z) and radius (R). Adds that tunnel-infinity feel.
CONTROLS.NAME: grid_dim_zr

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Travel speed through the Blue Steel grid – slow cruise or hyperspace jump.
CONTROLS.NAME: path_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rotates the whole grid – spin it like a DJ platter.
CONTROLS.NAME: path_rot

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Adds a tasty twist to the tunnel – licorice spiral mode engaged.
CONTROLS.NAME: path_twist

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: BPM divider – if the flash is too hyper, slow it down by 2 or 4.
CONTROLS.NAME: bpm_divider

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media opacity – fade your media from ghostly transparent to fully present.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_opacity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Boosts media intensity. Gentle nudge or full-blown neon meltdown.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_multiplier

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Snake color – the slinky traveler weaving through the grid.
CONTROLS.NAME: snake_col

DESCRIPTION: Step inside the shimmering Blue Steel grid – a tunnel so stylish even Zoolander would nod. Built on the shoulders of shader legends Inigo Quilez and Sam Hocevar (MIT & WTFPL magic).
TITLE: Blue Steel Grid
